paragraph_1: Hi, I'm Evan Godon, a front-end web developer from Montreal. I see myself as a life-long student with a high interest in learning new web technologies.
paragraph_2: I currently enjoy working on the front-end with React and TypeScript and I reach for Node when I need a backend service. Additionally, I like to get creative by dabbling in web design and css animations.
paragraph_3: I recently moved to Toronto and I am seeking a front-end or full-stack developer position in the downtown area.
